lexUnit.name: operate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: control a device (in order to acheive the prototypical function of the device).

sentence.text: The inevitable result is that the more adventurous or less safe ways of operating public transport aircraft are far less common now than they were before the days of flight recorders .
